item.description:
The warm weather is here to stay! Let's come out and have some delicious Malaysian Food at Penang in Chinatown. We'll meet inside the restaurant at 12pm.

Afterward we'll go for a nice stroll around Boston Common. If you are new to Boston or our meetup group, this is a great opportunity to meet new friends and learn more about the city and its rich history.

*** We have reserved a third table due to the overwhelming RSVP's to the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the 3 large tables inside Penang

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch at Penang
